name: Secret Mission: Critical Shoot
description:
Secret Mission: Critical Shooter is a shooting game with the theme of anti-terrorism. It is full of action, shooting and war. Your country is being threatened. Terrorists make terrorist attacks in the city. Your country is waiting for the hero to appear. You are an elite soldier, you have excellent shooting ability. Now is the time when you show your strength. Pick up your weapons, go to the battlefield, destroy all the terrorists. Save the innocent people. For you to better finish the mission, the army provides you with powerful weapons and equipment. You only need to go to the battlefield, show your superb shooting ability, clear all the terrorists, complete the mission.
Features:
- Challenging missions
- A lot of advanced weapons
- Real sniper experience
- Realistic battlefield environment
- High quality music and sound effects
- Play anytime, anywhere
